title: League is not compatible with your version of windows
body: I got this message yesterday  so I thought I had to reinstall league so after I reinstall I launch the game and I get the same message, "League Is not compatible with your version of windows. I have windows 7

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=HotNSpicy420,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qodumuTu,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-24T23:45:37.224+0000)
>
> I got this message yesterday  so I thought I had to reinstall league so after I reinstall I launch the game and I get the same message, &quot;League Is not compatible with your version of windows. I have windows 7

i have the same problem .. what is the solution |?!

> [{quoted}](name=Cap BarBosa,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qodumuTu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-29T02:52:27.922+0000)
>
> i have the same problem .. what is the solution |?!

For me I had the old client in my folder see if you do and delete it. If not try uninstalling and submit a support ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=afroriblaze,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qodumuTu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-30T22:52:55.356+0000)
>
> I'm having the same issues

Before you reinstall do you have an old client in your lol folder? If so delete it than league should open to you?

League is definitely still compatible with Windows 7. It could be giving you this error if you're missing some of the windows updates, as the client might be thinking your windows is out of date. Try going through and making sure you've got all the latest updates. 

Hit me back up if you're still having issues!
I tryed what you said what to, but always the update fail. I'm not sure why :(.

Since we know Windows 7 is absolutely compatible, and you've double-checked for any missing updates, we may need to take a much closer look that incompatibility issue. Reach out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys will be able to take a much closer look.
